name: certitude.
long_description:
certitude. trains a model for each employee, to which they can delegate any writing task.

our models write in their user's tone, maintain a universal memory layer, and take decisions the way the user would. each user can plug their model in a range of existing tools, automating their writing without decreasing output quality.

try our test bench to see how certitude performs in any text field on your machine.

----

Max and Marwan have known each other since the first days of freshman year at Penn. Together, before certitude, they built AI agents used by over 10k job applicants.

They built the first prototype of a certitude personal model in days, which received tens of thousands of API requests and hundreds of thousands of social media views in the first 48h.
one_liner: digital twins that work in your name via API.
